events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates, and I'm very concerned about the shipment delay.
The issue was categorized as a delivery delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment and lack of tracking updates.
The case was assigned to agent John M., who specializes in shipping and delivery issues for faster resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your order is delayed and not showing tracking updates; Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the name used when placing the order so I can check the shipping status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, placed under the name Emily Turner. I really need the package soon.
Thank you for the information. I checked with the carrier and found a delay due to transit issues. We can offer expedited shipping at no cost or a partial refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the quick update and the options. I would prefer expedited shipping to get my order as soon as possible, please.
We have upgraded your shipment to expedited service at no extra charge. You should receive a new tracking number shortly and your package within the next 3 days.
Just checking in to confirm that your expedited shipment has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution to your delivery delay.
Since your issue has been successfully resolved and confirmed received, we are now closing this case. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
